title: Sam Bankman-Fried arrested as bail is revoked
description:
Sam Bankman-Fried, the founder and former CEO of FTX, has had his bail revoked and will now be held in prison, Reuters said on Aug. 11. That report indicates that U.S. District Judge Lewis Kaplan revoked Bankman-Fried’s bail following earlier concerns about witness tampering. Judge Kaplan noted during the latest hearing that Bankman-Fried had provided […]

The post Sam Bankman-Fried arrested as bail is revoked appeared first on CryptoSlate.
